title: Did "Coo consumers on alleged hair loss" in Trisimi Shampoo?
subtitle: Facebook virus, and online articles, reported a potentially significant class action against Unilever in late 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In late 2020, a consumer in Illinois filed a class action against Unilever, claiming that the company had violated various laws in its use of a particular element in Shampo Tresimé.
